entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] [Feature Suggestion]: Automatic formatting for raw string literals #68537
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Closing parenthesis of pointer-type cast is colored incorrectly #68536
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Commas after non-array elements in JSON-like strings are colored incorrectly #68534
  • Is this issue still on the resolution list to be resolved? #68533

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing comma classification in json classification #68535
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not lower priority for refactorings #68530
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove CPD attribute on DiaSymReader dependency #68523
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
